server.description: Remote server dns name or IP address

username.description: Username to do authentication on remote server

password.description: Password to do authentication on remote server

users.description: List of user names to disable. `sids` or `users` must be specified

sids.description: List of SID`s to disable. `sids` or `users` must be specified

description: Disable specified users on remote server
name: Disable Users
